creativeQuestions.question: A creative! I see you :) What biome are we flying to?
creativeQuestions.a4: Plains with basic oak, birch, and flowers!

creativeQuestions.question: Beach day!! What do you want to do?
creativeQuestions.a2: Make a boat and go to a distant land far far away

creativeQuestions.question: GO FISH (get it??? Nevermind…) OMG we pulled a….
Cool cool! Where are you going?
Yay making a house! What block are you making your house out of?
So are you farming or hanging out with a wolf?
George of The Jungle! What’s the plan?
creativeQuestions.a2: Clear some land, I am afraid of heights

creativeQuestions.question: What do you want to make your house out of?
What to do?
Are we ready to change some lives! You make the place zombie proof and even spawn a couple of Golems are extra safety measures—very philanthropic. But lets think about you here…
What are you doing next in your house?
Cherry blossoms are pretty, and your house will be too! What are you making your house out of?
YeeHaw! You spawn a horse and get to work on building a farm!
We do need a companion! What creature are we thinking?
Now who is a good boy! But its getting dark outside...
RRRRRR MATEY! But its getting dark outside…
Meow! But its getting dark outside...
Horse girl energy (NAYY) ! But its getting dark outside…
Look at all these eggs to choose from, which mob suits you?
Your buddy needs a home though...
Time to make this house a home! What do we feel like the interior should look like?
creativeQuestions.a1: Practical, chests and a bed in the corner
creativeQuestions.a2: Living room, bedroom, kitchen, chairs you can’t physically sit in!

creativeQuestions.question: Now that the inner workings of our house are in order, lets get to the exterior. Whats the plan?
creativeQuestions.a1: Get a pet + make them a home
creativeQuestions.a2: I want to explore! (explora dora styleee)

creativeQuestions.question: After a long day, the sky fades into that familiar orange hue, you are filled with happiness and accomplishment of the day you’ve had… ITS MORPHIN TIME
creativeQuestions.a2: Who have I been talking to this whole time…?

creativeQuestions.question: Ok calm down with the excitement there champ! The team and I have been conducting real analysis on your personality and think you would really appreciate a new look that coincides with your aura
creativeQuestions.a1: Ugh fine give it to me

creativeQuestions.question: Hi there! Im one of the creators of this game :P call me god or whatever (god is a womannnnn - Ariana Grande) But let’s get back to the hero of this story: YOU! Dont you wanna know what happens next?
